C

com.example.addressbook - module com.example.addressbook
The main module that contains the Address Book JavaFX application, including the model, view, and controller classes.
com.example.addressbook - package com.example.addressbook
Contains the main class of the Address Book application that runs the JavaFX program.
com.example.addressbook.controller - package com.example.addressbook.controller
Contains the classes that handle the JavaFX GUI of the Address Book application.
com.example.addressbook.model - package com.example.addressbook.model
Contains model classes that represent the data of the Address Book application.
Contact - Class in com.example.addressbook.model
A simple model class representing a contact with a first name, last name, email, and phone number.
Contact(String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class com.example.addressbook.model.Contact
Constructs a new Contact with the specified first name, last name, email, and phone number.
ContactManager - Class in com.example.addressbook.model
A class that manages the operations of contacts in the address book.
ContactManager(IContactDAO) - Constructor for class com.example.addressbook.model.ContactManager
Constructs a new ContactManager with the specified IContactDAO.
contacts - Variable in class com.example.addressbook.model.MockContactDAO
A static list of contacts to be used as a mock database.

A singleton class that manages the SQLite database connection.
SqliteContactDAO - Class in com.example.addressbook.model
A SQLite implementation of the IContactDAO interface that handles the CRUD operations for the Contact class with the SQLite database using JDBC.
SqliteContactDAO() - Constructor for class com.example.addressbook.model.SqliteContactDAO
Constructs a new SqliteContactDAO with a connection to the SQLite database, and creates the contacts table if it does not exist.
